Description: Fragment from rim of Corinthian 'peaked-rim' pottery mortarium with spool-shaped hndle; added grit inside. Corinthian 'tile fabric'.
Bibliographic references: Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.33 fig.11, p.42 no.22)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. IV, no. 7)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GU.01)
